title: Log a Found Item
description: A housekeeper finds a pair of glasses in a room after a guest has checked out.

tasks.description: The housekeeper brings the item to the housekeeping office.
The supervisor logs the item in the lost and found system, noting the item description, room number, and date found.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new entry is accurately created in the lost and found log.

tasks.description: The physical item is tagged with the log number and placed in secure storage.
tasks.expected_outcome: The item is properly tagged and stored according to policy.
